pages.text: A Totem of Undying is a powerful artifact that can defy death itself, and this version does not change that. The events that occur after death can be changed however, and in many cases getting out of the situation is much better than surviving it.

Instead of just surviving death, this will let a simple $(l:immaterial/soul_shell)Soul Shell$(/l) take your place. $(br) The Totem of the Soul must be held in your hand the same as an unmodified Totem of Undying.

This totem must be bound to a destination $(l:immaterial/network_link)Network Link$(/l), (a specific one not just a color) and upon death it will attempt to send you through the ducts there. This teleport can only be received by a $(l:runes/soul_swap)Soul Swap Rune$(/l) and will leave all of your items with the Soul Shell.
